channel.title: About on Dr. Elliot
channel.description: Recent content in About on Dr. Elliot

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, and welcome to my blog! I’m an Unreal Engine developer with a strong focus on networking and gameplay systems. I’ve been using the engine for a little under three years, with a strong focus on gaining as much knowledge as I can. I’ve shifted a majority of my focus to learning more advanced networking techniques, and lately as been a focus on the Gameplay Ability System. Beyond development, I’m an avid gamer, deeply inspired by the intricate worlds and narratives of classics like Fallout 3 and Fallout: New Vegas.
